Spotify Shares Their Most Popular Artists, Albums, and Songs of 2014

posted by Confusion on December 4, 2014 in News

Spotify has put together their handsome end-of-the-year recap, sharing what songs people were listening to, what artists they liked, and what albums were popular. Check out some of the highlights below, and see the entire recap here.

See your own personalized year in music here.

Top male artist:
1. Ed Sheeran
2. Eminem
3. Calvin Harris
4. Avicii
5. David Guetta

Top female artist:
1. Katy Perry
2. Ariana Grande
3. Lana Del Rey
4. Beyonce
5. Lorde

Top group:
1. Coldplay
2. Imagine Dragons
3. Maroon 5
4. OneRepublic
5. One Direction

Breakout artist:
1. alt-J
2. Royal Blood
3. Tove Lo
4. Future Islands
5. Jungle

Top album:
1. Ed Sheeran – x
2. Sam Smith – In the Lonely Hour
3. Iggy Azalea – The New Classic
4. Pharrell – G I R L
5. Ariana Grande – My Everything

Top 10 Songs:
01. Pharrell Williams – “Happy”
02. Clean Bandit ft. Jessie Glynne – “Rather Be”
03. Calvin Harris – “Summer”
04. Katy Perry – “Dark Horse”
05. John Legend – “All Of Me”
06. Pitbull – “Timber”
07. Magic – “Rude”
08. Mr. Probz – “Waves”
09. Ariana Grande – “Problem”
10. OneRepublic – “Counting Stars”

Most popular icon:
Michael Jackson

Most dedicated fans:
Calibre 50

Most viral song:
Hozier – “Take Me To Church”

The most shared song of winter:
Pharrell Williams – “Happy”

The most shared song of spring:
John Legend – “All Of Me”

The most shared song of summer:
Magic! – “Rude”

The most shared song of autumn:
Maghan Trainer – “All About That Bass”

The track that America loved
Childish Gambino – “3005”

Tags:  music industry, spotify
